meanings.definition: A type of tree found in southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The mopane tree provides shade in the hot African sun.
meanings.sent2: People in southern Africa often use mopane leaves for medicinal purposes.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys played hide-and-seek around the sturdy mopane tree.
meanings.sent4: The mopane tree stood tall like a guardian of the savanna.
meanings.sent5: The rustling leaves of the mopane tree whispered ancient stories.

meanings.definition: The wood of the mopane tree, used for various purposes.
meanings.sent1: Craftsmen carve beautiful figurines from mopane wood.
meanings.sent2: The furniture in the lodge was made of polished mopane.
meanings.sent3: The children built a fort out of small pieces of mopane.
meanings.sent4: The rich aroma of freshly cut mopane wood filled the workshop.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns in the mopane wood seemed to tell a tale of its own.

meanings.definition: A type of butterfly found in Africa, named after the mopane tree.
meanings.sent1: The colorful mopane butterfly fluttered gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Children chased after the elusive mopane butterfly in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The mopane butterfly seemed to dance in the air, teasing the flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as the wings of a mopane butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The delicate wings of the mopane butterfly shimmered in the sunlight.
